name: Bullet Time (itch) (GAMESMAN)
description:
Bullet time is a game about eating bullets with a twist.

You have to avoid bullets.

Eat Fruits stay healthy.

Use keyboard w and s Keys to move up and down.

If you are having issues that controls not working click on the game screen with mouse then play with keyboard.

BTW you are taken as a Hostage Survive.

Proudly made with GDevelop.
